item.description:

[quote="`John, post:7, topic:370489"][quote author=n10si t link=topic=466592.msg3412507#msg3412507 date=1290809423]

public void handleLootShare(Client c, int item, int amount) {
                sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " + amount + "x " + Server.itemHandler.getItemName(item) + " from: "+ Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(killedBy) +".");  
        }

Will that work?
[/quote]

Can’t find the killedBy variable.[/quote]

I don’t know. I guess wait for vain to find that method.

public void handleLootShare(Client c, int item, int amount) {
                sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " + amount + "x " + Server.itemHandler.getItemName(item) + " from: "+ Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName() +".");  
        }

Not sure what the method is to find out who killed which NPC.

But that’s the set up.

I’ll find it soon enough.
[/quote]

I said I wasn’t sure the method, so it won’t work yet.[/quote]

src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:202: getNpcListName(int) in server.model.n
pcs.NPCHandler cannot be applied to ()
                sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " +
 amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item)+ " from: "+ Server.np
cHandler.getNpcListName() +".");

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.

item.description:
@_John wrote:

I get this when I compile:

src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:202: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable npc
location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler
                sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " +
 amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item) + " from: "+server.mo
del.npcs.NPCHandler.getNpcListName(npc)+".");


                                   ^
src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:202: non-static method getNpcListName(int)
 cannot be referenced from a static context

 amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item) + " from: "+server.mo
del.npcs.NPCHandler.getNpcListName(npc)+".");

public void handleLootShare(Client c, int item, int amount) {
		sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " + amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item) + " from: "+server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.getNpcListName(npc)+".");	
	}

Idk if that’ll work but worth a shot.

item.title: Project Insanity Clan Chat help
item.dc:creator: @_John `John
item.description:
@_John wrote:

Well I want my lootshare to announce not only the item, but the NPC it was earned from.

Here’s what I have:

public void handleLootShare(Client c, int item, int amount) {
		sendLootShareMessage(c.clanId, c.playerName + " has received " + amount + "x " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(item) + ".");	
	}
